pages.text: Dragons and practitioners of GRAYCE prefer warm, verdent climates and those rich with natural magic. The oldest of the races, Dragons were able to stake their claim in their preferred biomes with little resistance.
Level 3 Biomes$(li)Cherry Blossom Grove$(li)Coniferous Forest$(li)Eucalyptus Forest$(li)Lush Desert$(li)Temperate Rainforest$(li)JungleHills$(li)Magical Forest
Level 4 Biomes$(li)Bamboo Forest$(li)Flower Island$(li)Oasis$(li)Tropical Rainforest$(li)JungleEdge M$(li)Roofed Forest
